body:
and now with paris, no, without a doubt you have no salvation, go ahead, degrade yourself more by doing this type of crap like most ntr artists, since others at least do different genres

and before you call me vanillatard , there are many more genres out there than vanilla , futanari , shotacon , lolicon , incest , etc , etc , etc , but always putting it together with ntr just shows how shitty hentai has become lately , he tentacle in itself was weird before but compared to what they do now it's a fucking hell of shit in which you are included
How is Ankoman this stupid? Everyone knows Florence Nightingale IS NOT MARRIED TO ANY FUCKING BODY UNTIL HER FINAL DAY
